Public Delegate Sub ParameterizedThreadStart(obj As Object)

param.name: obj
param.span: 包含线程过程的数据的对象。

summary.span: 表示在 上执行的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that executes on a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个托管的线程时，由表示的线程执行的方法：When a managed thread is created, the method that executes on the thread is represented by: - A委托传递给构造函数。A delegate that is passed to the constructor. 该操作没有参数，将返回的任何方法`void`在 C# 或`Sub`Visual Basic 中的过程可以表示该委托。Any method that has no parameters and that returns `void` in C# or is a `Sub` procedure in Visual Basic can represent the delegate. - A委托传递给构造函数。A delegate that is passed to the constructor. 只有一个参数类型的任何方法并且返回 void 在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的 Sub 过程可以表示该委托。Any method that has a single parameter of type and that returns void in C# or is a Sub procedure in Visual Basic can represent the delegate. 线程不会开始执行之前调用方法。The thread does not begin executing until the method is called. 或的线程上调用委托和委托所表示的方法的第一个行处开始执行。The or delegate is invoked on the thread, and execution begins at the first line of the method represented by the delegate. 情况下委托，该对象传递给方法传递给委托。In the case of the delegate, the object that is passed to the method is passed to the delegate. > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic 和 C# 用户可以省略或委托构造函数创建线程时。Visual Basic and C# users can omit the or delegate constructor when creating a thread. 在 Visual Basic 中，使用`AddressOf`运算符传递到你的方法时构造函数; 例如， `Dim t As New Thread(AddressOf ThreadProc)`。In Visual Basic, use the `AddressOf` operator when passing your method to the constructor; for example, `Dim t As New Thread(AddressOf ThreadProc)`. 在 C# 中，只需指定线程过程的名称。In C#, simply specify the name of the thread procedure. 编译器选择正确的委托构造函数。The compiler selects the correct delegate constructor. > [!NOTE] > 当你创建委托 c + + 中的第一个参数的构造函数的实例方法为实例变量。When you create a delegate for an instance method in C++, the first parameter of the constructor is the instance variable. 对于静态方法，构造函数的第一个参数为零。For a static method, the first parameter of the constructor is zero. 对于静态方法，委托构造函数只需要一个参数： 回调方法中，由类名称限定的地址。For a static method, the delegate constructor requires only one parameter: the address of the callback method, qualified by the class name. 委托和方法重载进行轻松地将数据传递给一个线程的过程，但此方法不是类型安全，因为可以将任何对象传递给。The delegate and the method overload make it easy to pass data to a thread procedure, but this technique is not type safe because any object can be passed to . 若要将数据传递给一个线程的过程更可靠方法是放入一个辅助对象的线程的过程和数据字段。A more robust way to pass data to a thread procedure is to put both the thread procedure and the data fields into a worker object. 有关详细信息，请参阅[创建线程并在启动时传递数据](~/docs/standard/threading/creating-threads-and-passing-data-at-start-time.md)。For more information, see [Creating Threads and Passing Data at Start Time](~/docs/standard/threading/creating-threads-and-passing-data-at-start-time.md). 委托支持单个参数。The delegate supports only a single parameter. 你可以将传递到的多个数据项通过进行以下情况之一，该参数：You can pass multiple data items to the by making that parameter one of the following: - 一个数组。An array. - 集合类型中，如果所有的数据项均为相同的类型。A collection type, if all of the data items are of the same type. - 元组类型，如或。A tuple type, such as or . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用委托中执行的静态方法和实例方法。The following code example uses a delegate to execute a static method and an instance method. 第一个委托表示的静态`DoWork`实例表示方法和第二个`DoMoreWork`方法。The first delegate is represented by the static `DoWork` method and the second is represented by the instance `DoMoreWork` method. 这两种方法匹配委托签名; 也就是说，它们具有单个类型的参数且不返回值。Both methods match the delegate signature; that is, they have a single parameter of type and don't return a value. > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic 和 C# 编译器推断委托的签名从`DoWork`和`DoMoreWork`方法，并调用正确的构造函数。The Visual Basic and C# compilers infer the delegate from the signatures of the `DoWork` and `DoMoreWork` methods, and call the correct constructor. 因此，代码中的没有显式构造函数调用。Thus, there is no explicit constructor call in the code.
